Navigate to 'https://demo.app/login'
Verify the 'Username' input field has placeholder 'Enter your username', border 1px solid #cccccc, and is enabled
Verify the 'Password' input field is visible, width 200px, height 32px, and background color #ffffff
Verify the 'Sign In' button text color #ffffff, background color #007bff, font size 16px, font weight 600, border radius 4px, x position 150, and y position 280
Open 'https://shop.example.com/item/456'
Verify the main product image has source 'product_main.webp', rendered dimensions 600x450px, natural dimensions 1200x900px, and alt text 'Premium Wireless Headphones'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, enabled, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, font size 18px, padding 10px 20px, and transition property for background color of 300ms ease
Access 'https://shop.example.com/cart'
Verify the cart item count displays '3 items'
Verify the 'Total Price' text is 'USD 129.99', font size 24px, font weight 700, and text align right
Verify the 'Proceed to Checkout' button is enabled, has border radius 5px, width 250px, height 48px, background #ffc107, and label 'Proceed to Checkout'
Go to 'https://app.example.com/profile'
Verify the 'Edit Profile' button is visible, has border 1px solid #007bff, text color #007bff, and padding 8px 16px
Verify the user avatar image has source 'avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 80x80px, is loaded, and has border radius 50%
Verify the 'Change Password' link has font size 14px, color #6c757d, and y position 400
Perform a search for 'laptops' on 'https://store.example.com/search?q=laptops'
Verify the result count displays 'Showing 25 of 150 results'
Verify the 'Filter' button is visible, enabled, has background color #e9ecef, text color #343a40, and left margin 10px
Verify the pagination element has 6 visible buttons
Verify the 'Next' button has aria-label 'Go to next page', font weight 500, and border 1px solid #dee2e6
Open 'https://contact.example.com'
Submit an empty form
Verify the 'Email' input field displays placeholder 'your@example.com', has border color #dc3545 after submission, and becomes focused
Verify the error message 'Email is required' is visible, has font size 14px, color #dc3545, and top position 10px below the input field
Verify the 'Submit' button is disabled until valid input, has opacity 0.6, and background color #6c757d when disabled
Access 'https://media.example.com/video/123'
Verify the video player is visible, width 800px, height 450px, and is initially not muted
Verify the 'Play' button has an SVG icon, color #ffffff, and background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Verify the 'Play' button state changes to 'Pause' upon click
Verify the progress bar has height 8px, background color #e9ecef, and fill color #007bff, changing dynamically with 100ms transition
Open 'https://example.com/products'
Verify the 'Products' navigation link is active, has text color #007bff, font weight 700, and an underline border 2px solid #007bff
Verify the 'Categories' dropdown menu is hidden initially
Verify the 'Categories' dropdown menu appears on hover, has background color #ffffff, padding 10px, border 1px solid #ccc, and transition for opacity of 200ms ease-out
Verify each dropdown item has font size 15px and color #333333
View the image gallery at 'https://gallery.example.com/album/nature'
Verify the first thumbnail is selected, having border 2px solid #007bff and border radius 3px
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is visible, has an icon, background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7), and aria-label 'Enter fullscreen view'
Verify the main image displays 'image_01.jpg', has no watermark, rendered width 1024px, and load time under 200ms
Open 'https://booking.example.com'
Verify today's date '25' is selected, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and border radius 50%
Verify the 'Previous Month' arrow button is enabled, has width 30px, height 30px, and color #6c757d
Verify the current month displayed is 'September 2024', font weight 600, and text align center
Open 'https://app.example.com/dashboard'
Trigger a success action
Verify the toast notification appears at top right (x: 90%, y: 20px), is visible, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, and displays 'Action completed successfully'
Verify the toast notification has padding 15px, border radius 8px, and animation that fades it in over 500ms and fades out after 3s
Verify the toast notification maximum width is 300px
View the data table on 'https://reports.example.com'
Verify the table displays exactly 10 rows of data
Verify the 'Product Name' column header has text 'Product Name', font weight 600, text align left, and is sortable
Verify the 'Price' column values are right-aligned, font size 14px, and have color #333333
Verify the entire table has border 1px solid #e0e0e0
Open 'https://cloud.example.com/upload'
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar is visible, its current value is 75%, width 300px, and height 10px
Verify the filled portion of the bar has background color #007bff and border radius 5px
Verify the percentage text displays 75%, font size 12px, color #333333, and is centered above the bar
Load the map widget on 'https://travel.example.com/map'
Verify the map is rendered, centered at coordinates 40.7128, -74.0060
Verify the 'Zoom In' button is visible, enabled, has width 36px, height 36px, and background color rgba(0,0,0,0.6)
Verify the 'Satellite' map type button is not selected, has text color #ffffff, and font size 14px
Verify the map canvas has border 1px solid #cccccc
Open 'https://dashboard.example.com'
Hover over the 'Help' icon
Verify the tooltip becomes visible, has text content 'Click for assistance', background color #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, and border radius 4px
Verify the tooltip appears 10px below the icon, centered horizontally, and has opacity 1.0
Verify the tooltip font size is 12px
Verify the tooltip disappears after the mouse leaves the icon
Open 'https://app.example.com/settings'
Click 'Open Modal'
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered on the screen, has width 500px, height 300px, and background color #ffffff
Verify the overlay behind the modal has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7) and covers the entire viewport
Verify the 'Close' button (X icon) is in the top-right corner, has color #333333, and aria-label 'Close dialog'
Open 'https://checkout.example.com'
Verify the 'Credit Card' option is selected by default
Verify its associated label 'Credit Card' has font weight 600
Verify the 'PayPal' radio button is not selected, is enabled, and its text color is #333333
Verify the entire group has margin-top 20px
Verify each radio button element has width 16px and height 16px
Open 'https://mail.example.com'
Log in
Verify the notification bell icon displays count '5' in a badge, with the badge having background color #dc3545 and text color #ffffff
Verify the bell icon is visible and has color #333333
Verify when the bell icon is clicked, it becomes active with color #007bff
Verify the badge has border radius 50% and font size 10px
View the product carousel on 'https://product.example.com/gallery'
Verify the first slide is active, displayed with opacity 1.0
Verify the navigation dots below the carousel show 5 dots
Verify the active dot has background color #007bff and diameter 10px
Verify transitioning to the next slide takes 500ms with 'linear' animation
Verify the image source for the active slide is 'carousel_slide_1.jpg'
Verify each dot has margin 5px
Access the terms and conditions on 'https://app.example.com/terms'
Verify the scrollable content area has height 400px, width 600px, and its scroll-top is initially 0px
Verify the scrollbar is visible, its track color is #f1f1f1, and the thumb color is #888
Verify the text content inside the area has font size 14px, line height 1.5, and text align justify
